step.stepresult: The Privilege Sets page appears, displaying a list of privilege sets.
The Privilege Details page appears, displaying a list of groups associated with the selected privilege set.

step.cmd: In the Enter a Group Name box, specify a group name that you want to add to the privilege set, and then select Add.

taskbody.result: The group is added to the privilege set. The users associated with the group in the identity provider application are added to this privilege set.
